verses.verse: <S%H430>God,<s%> you have <S%H2186>rejected<s%> <S%H6555>us.<s%> You have broken us <S%H599>down.<s%> You have been angry. Restore <S%H7725>us,<s%> again.
You have made the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7493>tremble.<s%> You have <S%H6480>torn<s%> <S%H7495>it.<s%> Mend its <S%H7667>fractures,<s%> for it <S%H4131>quakes.<s%>
You have <S%H7200>shown<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> hard <S%H7186>things.<s%> You have made us <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> that makes us <S%H8653>stagger.<s%>
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> to those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H5127>you,<s%> that it may be displayed <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7189>truth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
So that your <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered,<s%> <S%H2502>save<s%> with your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and answer <S%H6030>us.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> from his <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> "I will <S%H5937>triumph.<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and measure <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is <S%H4519>mine,<s%> and Manasseh is <S%H669>mine.<s%> Ephraim also is the <S%H4581>defense<s%> of my <S%H7218>head.<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>scepter.<s%>
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is my wash <S%H5518>basin.<s%> I will <S%H7993>throw<s%> my <S%H5275>shoe<s%> on <S%H123>Edom.<s%> I shout in <S%H7321>triumph<s%> over <S%H6429>Philistia.<s%>"
Who will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> Who has <S%H5148>led<s%> me to <S%H123>Edom?<s%>
<S%H430>Haven't<s%> you, God, rejected <S%H430>us?<s%> You don't go out with our armies, God.
<S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> against the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%> for the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly,<s%> for it is he who will tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
